fields.name: MAGICC_variable
fields.description: The name of the variable as sometimes used in MAGICC. The names in MAGICC aren't always consistent hence this won't always be how it's called and so this name is a bit misleading..

fields.name: Concentration_units
fields.description: Units in which this variable is calculated and expected in MAGICC, written in a format which Pint can read.

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: Some notes about how this DATTYPE and REGIONMODE combination are used in MAGICC internally. Only notes so may not actually reflect the truth.

fields.name: THISFILE_DATTYPE
fields.description: The value expected by MAGICC for the THISFILE_DATTYPE flag when the regions match the given regions.

fields.name: THISFILE_REGIONMODE
fields.description: The value expected by MAGICC for the THISFILE_REGIONMODE flag when the regions match the given regions.

fields.name: Region1
fields.description: The regions in the RegionX columns define the region set which match the given THISFILE_DATTYPE and THISFILE_REGIONMODE flags.

fields.name: MAGICC variable
fields.description: The name of the variable as sometimes used in MAGICC. The names in MAGICC aren't always consistent hence this won't always be how it's called and so this name is a bit misleading..

fields.name: emissions units
fields.description: Units in which this variable is calculated and expected in MAGICC, written in a format which Pint can read.

fields.name: SCEN emms code 0
fields.description: True if this emissions species is expected in a SCEN file whose SCEN emissions code is 0 (see documentation of `pymagicc/io.py::_ScenWriter.get_special_scen_code` for further explanation).

fields.name: SCEN emms code 1
fields.description: True if this emissions species is expected in a SCEN file whose SCEN emissions code is 1 (see documentation of `pymagicc/io.py::_ScenWriter.get_special_scen_code` for further explanation).

fields.name: prn emms
fields.description: True if this emissions species is expected in a `.prn file`.
